Name: Space Harrier™ II
About the game: A call for help comes from deep in the universe. Fantasyland has been taken over by destructive forces. Quick on the scene is Space Harrier™ equipped with his laser, who must attempt to outwit and outmanoeuvre the hoards and prevent Fantasyland from being blown into oblivion!
Meta Title: Space Harrier™ II: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Space Harrier™ II? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
